title: Lemon Pecan Slab Pie
ingredients: 4 tsp lemon zest plus 6 Tbsp lemon juice
2 c chopped pecans plus 3 c pecan halves
instructions: Spray 17x12 in rimmed baking sheet with cooking spray. Unroll pie crusts and place them on baking sheet. Cut the crusts to fit together. Crimp the dough around edges. Chill while preparing filling.
In large bowl, whisk brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs. Stir in butter, milk, flour, lemon zest, lemon juice, and vanilla. Pour mixture into unbaked pie shell. Arrange pecan halves on top.
Bake until golden brown and filling is set but still a little loose in center, about 55 mins.
